Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.networking.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.core.EventSource
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.networking.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientHandler
extends EventSource
implements java.lang.Runnable
server thread that handles the client connection and socket read/write methods

      private void connectionLost()

    • handleClientConnection

      private void handleClientConnection() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      called when the tread is started
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - error opening the object input/output stream
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - throw when there is an error casting the received event

    • startPing

      public void startPing()
      it starts a pinging service from the server to the client writing a ping event to the socket every 5000 millis
